sectionText: Spring 2017 FR 573 Critique et sentiment au XVIIIe si�cle. Study of two key and complementary concepts in 18th-century French philosophy and literature. May include texts by such authors as Marivaux, Montesquieu, Graffigny, Diderot, Rousseau, Laclos, Mercier, Charri�re, as well as extracts of texts written during the Revolution.  Course taught in French. Theoretical readings in French and in English.
